entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy Load Proxy loses the System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NullableAttribute from properties #29391
  • Is there a way to define a different order of inserting elements when Table-Per-Type is used? #29390
  • Migrations messing up my schema. #29389
  • Parallel requests in asp core with EF core produce FOREIGN KEY constraint conflict #29387
  • add-migration within VS Package Manager Console hangs due to Debug.Assert() (in own code) #29386
  • Query from IQueryable and Add Some Filter #29385

Closed

  • Support value tuples in CSharpHelper #29383
  • The change of a navigation to a new instance and removing the old instance throws an Exception #29356
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support value tuples in CSharpHelper #29384
  • [release/7.0] Fix batching boundary with cycle breaking #29388
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29355 - FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29366
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
